title: American Horror Stories: What to Expect from the AHS Spinoff?
author: Reel Talk
comment: Honestly I'm very positive about this spin off really!
To me AHS stories is just the warm up to the main course that is AHS double feature, like I’m way more excited so a NEW season
Damn I thought this would be a positive video to get me excited for the season. I’m excited for any ahs content.
Absolutely LOVE your channel and content! Currently binge watching your videos while smoking a joint 💨

I enjoyed Stories e1/e2 but it was literally a modern version of AHS: Murder House. It was pretty much the same storyline with a gay couple and a Rubber (Wo)man and a new cast. Shouldn't be that difficult for Ryan to come up with brand new short horror stories. There's literally so many horror ideas he could've used. I guess only time will tell how original they will be with upcoming Stories episodes. So far it seems that there's promise with the rest of the season according to the trailer for stories. But again I did enjoy e1/e2 due to nostalgic reasons and a few violent scenes. I jumped up a couple of times because of jump scares lol (darn Infantata!!!). Btw some of the shots of the house outside of Murder House were beautifully done.
description:
American Horror Stories: What to Expect from the AHS Spinoff? With American Horror Stories set to premier on FX on Hulu this upcoming week, Dallas and I talk about our thoughts on the upcoming spinoff. It seems like there will be a lot of stuff we've already seen before, but the series might have a few big surprises. 

Deadass Serious:
